Task Description: Create functionality to import data in JSON format into the local database.
Success Criteria: JSON data is successfully imported with correct structure and all required fields validated.

Task Description: Develop a module to read CSV files and import the data into the database.
Success Criteria: CSV data is imported accurately with validation to handle missing or incorrect values.

Task Description: Add support for importing GeoJSON data & include geospatial details.
Success Criteria: GeoJSON data is imported with correct geospatial attributes and all fields validated.

Task Name: Develop API Sync for Google Data - Initial Connection Setup
Task Description: Establish initial OAuth connection to Google's API.
Success Criteria: OAuth connection successfully established and token received.

Task Name: Develop API Sync for Google Data - Data Extraction Logic
Task Description: Write code to extract relevant data from Google API.
Success Criteria: Data successfully extracted from Google API and stored in the database.

Task Name: Develop API Sync for Google Data - Error Handling and Logging
Task Description: Implement error handling and logging mechanisms for Google Data Sync.
Success Criteria: All errors during Google Data Sync are logged and appropriate error messages are displayed.

Task Name: Handle Error Cases for Invalid File Formats - Detect Invalid Formats
Task Description: Add logic to detect and flag invalid file formats during imports.
Success Criteria: Invalid file formats are detected and flagged before processing.

Task Name: Handle Error Cases for Invalid File Formats - Generate User-Friendly Error Messages
Task Description: Generate detailed error messages for users when invalid formats are detected.
Success Criteria: User receives clear and actionable error messages for invalid file formats.

Task Name: Develop API Sync for Spotify Data - Authentication and Token Management
Task Description: Set up OAuth authentication for accessing Spotify's API and manage tokens securely.
Success Criteria: OAuth authentication successfully completed and tokens managed securely.

Task Name: Develop API Sync for Spotify Data - Data Retrieval
Task Description: Create functionality to retrieve user data from Spotify via their API.
Success Criteria: User data from Spotify is retrieved and stored in the local database.

Task Name: Develop Manual Data Sync for Microsoft Data
Task Description: Create functionality to manually import data from Microsoft services.
Success Criteria: Data manually imported from Microsoft services is correctly stored in the database.
